  1. # -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
  2. from html5lib import sanitizer, serializer, treebuilders, treewalkers
  3. import html5lib
  5. DEFAULT_PARSER = html5lib.HTMLParser(tokenizer=sanitizer.HTMLSanitizer,
  6. tree=treebuilders.getTreeBuilder("dom"))
  8. def clean_html(data, full=True, parser=DEFAULT_PARSER):
  9. """
  10. Cleans HTML from XSS vulnerabilities using html5lib
  12. If full is False, only the contents inside <body> will be returned (without
  13. the <body> tags).
  14. """
  15. if full:
  16. dom_tree = parser.parse(data)
  17. else:
  18. dom_tree = parser.parseFragment(data)
  19. walker = treewalkers.getTreeWalker("dom")
  20. stream = walker(dom_tree)
  21. s = serializer.htmlserializer.HTMLSerializer(omit_optional_tags=False,
  22. quote_attr_values=True)
  23. return u''.join(s.serialize(stream))
